thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 38 of 918
thread.title: Klerk

author: Klerk
title: Klerk
text:
At first, I thought this was one of those website that sells used keys, like some other website. I have been scammed twice, buying game keys online so I thought bundle star is one of them. however, I tried buying once, and now I always check Bundle stars everyday for better game deals.
However, as a customer I would like to feel safe when receiving and activating a key. Bundle star should have a safety feature like code verification to avoid other people hacking in to your account (like 2 step verification from google/steam).
